item.title: Maya Universe Academy
item.description: Nestled on the hills of a small highway town in central Nepal, Maya Universe Academy occupies a unique space within the development of education in the country.

item.title: The Dashain Industrial Complex
item.description: Nepalis are reinforced that Dashain is a time for consumption at a young age and extreme consumer culture still continues today.

item.title: Digital Wallets in Nepal
item.description: Nestled between two massive and burgeoning economies, Nepal has largely been lying dormant while its neighbors have witnessed a technological upheaval within the past decade.

item.title: about us
item.description: neptro is comprised of a small group of Nepalis living in the U.S. that share a common curiosity about how emerging technologies and enterprises are shaping markets back in Nepal.
